summary:
Alex Miller is a seasoned Backend Engineer with a strong educational background in Information Systems from Tech University of Central and City College of Central. He holds a Bachelor of Engineering degree and a Master of Engineering degree, both in Information Systems, with a cumulative GPA of 3.45 and 3.97, respectively.

With over 4 years of experience in the industry, Alex has worked as a Full Stack Developer at Nextlytics and Data Engineer at CodeSpring. His achievements include successfully migrating legacy VM clusters to GCP and Azure with zero downtime, leading a team to deliver ETL replatform on time, and designing and implementing various data pipelines and monitoring stacks.

Alex's technical skills are diverse and extensive, with proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, C++, and TypeScript. He is also well-versed in web development frameworks like Django, Express, React, Node.js, and FastAPI. His data skills include proficiency in Pandas, SQL, scikit-learn, PyTorch, and TensorFlow. Additionally, he has expertise in cloud and DevOps tools such as GCP, Terraform, Kubernetes, Azure, and AWS.
